amuse.nodes.trainer
Class TrainingConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  amuse.interfaces.nodes.TaskConfiguration
      amuse.nodes.trainer.TrainingConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class TrainingConfiguration
extends TaskConfiguration

Describes the parameters for a classification training task

Constructor Detail

TrainingConfiguration

public TrainingConfiguration(java.lang.String processedFeaturesModelName,
                             java.lang.String algorithmDescription,
                             java.lang.String preprocessingAlgorithmDescription,
                             DataInputInterface groundTruthSource,
                             TrainingConfiguration.GroundTruthSourceType groundTruthSourceType)
Standard constructor

Parameters:
processedFeaturesModelName - Description of the processed features model
algorithmDescription - ID of classification algorithm from classificationTrainerTable.arff
groundTruthSource - Source with ground truth for model training. Can be either - Id of the music category from $AMUSECATEGORYDATABASE$/categoryTable.arff or - Path to the labeled file list or - Path to the ready training input (prepared e.g. by a validator method) - Ready input (as EditableDataSet)
groundTruthSourceType - Describes the source type of ground truth
pathToOutputModel - Alternative path for saving of training model(s) (three possibilities are given above)

TrainingConfiguration

public TrainingConfiguration(java.lang.String processedFeaturesModelName,
                             java.lang.String algorithmDescription,
                             java.lang.String preprocessingAlgorithmDescription,
                             DataInputInterface groundTruthSource,
                             TrainingConfiguration.GroundTruthSourceType groundTruthSourceType,
                             java.lang.String pathToOutputModel)
Alternative constructor if pathToInputModel must be set (e.g. for validator or optimizer)

Parameters:
processedFeaturesModelName - Description of the processed features model
algorithmDescription - ID of classification algorithm from classificationTrainerTable.arff
groundTruthSource - Source with ground truth for model training. Can be either - Id of the music category from $AMUSECATEGORYDATABASE$/categoryTable.arff or - Path to the labeled file list or - Path to the ready training input (prepared e.g. by a validator method) - Ready input (as EditableDataSet)
groundTruthSourceType - Describes the source type of ground truth
pathToOutputModel - Alternative path for saving of training model(s) (three possibilities are given above)
